description:
When a prefectural assembly member comes to the school for an inspection, a call is issued for two volunteers from Riki`s class to show him around the campus. Remembering the most recent letter from Lennon, Riki and Rin timidly raise their hands. Rin does her best as they show the assembly member around, and though her nerves are apparent, the man seems to find her awkward behavior charming. After he leaves, Rin is summoned to the faculty office...
Source: crunchyroll
